nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
中共中央政治局常委会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee
Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高权力常设机关，也是中国共产党和中华人民共和国实际上的最高领导及决策机构。
description.en: The permanent body of the highest authority of the Communist Party of China, and the de facto top leadership and decision-making body of the CPC and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是中华人民共和国第五代最高领导人。
description.en: The current General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He is the fifth-generation paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中共中央书记处排名第一的书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and the First Secretary of the CCP Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局常委、中共中央纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the CCP and the Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee
Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党中央委员会全体会议选举产生，是中国共产党中央领导机构之一。
description.en: Elected by the Plenary Session of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, it is one of the central leading bodies of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党全国代表大会选举产生，是党的最高领导机关。
description.en: Elected by the National Congress of the Communist Party of China, it is the highest leading body of the Party.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局和中央政治局常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The working body of the Politburo and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党集体领导制度

zh-cn: 中国共产党集体领导制度
en: Collective leadership system of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的组织原则和领导制度，旨在防止个人专断。
description.en: An organizational and leadership principle of the CPC aimed at preventing personal autocracy.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Secretariat of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席，是中共第三代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the CCP, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the CMC, who was the core of the third generation of CCP central leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中央政法委书记，后因腐败问题被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Secretary of the Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission, later investigated for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生于中国北京的政治运动，对中国政局产生深远影响。
description.en: A political movement that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, which had a profound impact on Chinese politics.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议
en: Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 在六四事件后召开的中央全会，对中共高层领导进行了人事调整。
description.en: A plenary session of the Central Committee held after the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, which resulted in a personnel reshuffle of the top CCP leadership.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局常务委员会是中共中央政治局的常设机构。
description.en: The Politburo Standing Committee is the standing body of the Politburo.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局由中共中央委员会全体会议选举产生。
description.en: The Politburo is elected by the Plenary Session of the Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央书记处
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央书记处是中共中央政治局常务委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The Central Secretariat is the working body of the Politburo Standing Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会总书记，排名第一。
description.en: Serves as the General Secretary of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking first.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第二。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking second.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第三。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking third.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第四。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking fourth.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第五。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking fifth.

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第六。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking sixth.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第二十届中共中央政治局常务委员会委员，排名第七。
description.en: Serves as a member of the 20th Politburo Standing Committee, ranking seventh.

relationships.target: 中国共产党集体领导制度

description.zh-cn: 习近平出任总书记后，大幅度提升总书记的地位和权力，改变了原来的集体领导制度，导致政治局常委会的决策权和重要性下降。
description.en: After Xi Jinping became General Secretary, he significantly enhanced the status and power of the General Secretary, changing the original collective leadership system, which led to a decline in the decision-making power and importance of the Politburo Standing Committee.

relationships.target: 习近平

description.zh-cn: 自2017年中共十九大后，规定中共中央政治局常委需向中共中央总书记述职。
description.en: Since the 19th CCP National Congress in 2017, it has been stipulated that members of the Politburo Standing Committee must report their work to the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.target: 习近平

description.zh-cn: 自2017年中共十九大后，规定中共中央政治局常委需向中共中央总书记述职。
description.en: Since the 19th CCP National Congress in 2017, it has been stipulated that members of the Politburo Standing Committee must report their work to the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.target: 习近平

description.zh-cn: 自2017年中共十九大后，规定中共中央政治局常委需向中共中央总书记述职。
description.en: Since the 19th CCP National Congress in 2017, it has been stipulated that members of the Politburo Standing Committee must report their work to the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自2017年中共十九大后，规定中共中央政治局常委需向中共中央总书记述职。
description.en: Since the 19th CCP National Congress in 2017, it has been stipulated that members of the Politburo Standing Committee must report their work to the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 自2017年中共十九大后，规定中共中央政治局常委需向中共中央总书记述职。
description.en: Since the 19th CCP National Congress in 2017, it has been stipulated that members of the Politburo Standing Committee must report their work to the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.target: 习近平

description.zh-cn: 自2017年中共十九大后，规定中共中央政治局常委需向中共中央总书记述职。
description.en: Since the 19th CCP National Congress in 2017, it has been stipulated that members of the Politburo Standing Committee must report their work to the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 六四事件直接导致了十三届四中全会的召开，会上对中共高层进行了人事调整。
description.en: The 1989 Tiananmen Square protests directly led to the convening of the Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee, where a leadership reshuffle took place.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议
relationships.target: 胡启立

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件中的立场，胡启立在十三届四中全会被免去中央政治局常委等职务。
description.en: Due to his stance during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Hu Qili was removed from his posts, including member of the Politburo Standing Committee, at the Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议
relationships.target: 赵紫阳

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件中的立场，赵紫阳在十三届四中全会被免去中央委员会总书记等职务。
description.en: Due to his stance during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, Zhao Ziyang was removed from his posts, including General Secretary of the Central Committee, at the Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十三届中央委员会第四次全体会议
relationships.target: 江泽民

description.zh-cn: 在十三届四中全会上，江泽民被选举为中央委员会总书记，并增补为中央政治局常委。
description.en: At the Fourth Plenary Session of the 13th Central Committee, Jiang Zemin was elected General Secretary of the Central Committee and added to the Politburo Standing Committee.

relationships.target: 周永康

description.zh-cn: 2014年12月5日，周永康被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: On December 5, 2014, Zhou Yongkang was expelled from the Communist Party of China.
